abstract: Venezuela has granted BP permission to negotiate the sale of its assets in the South American OPEC member, Venezuelan Oil Minister Rafael Ramirez said on Sunday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Venezuela has granted BP permission to negotiate the sale of its assets in the South American OPEC member, Venezuelan Oil Minister Rafael Ramirez said on Sunday, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela has granted BP permission to negotiate the sale of its assets in the South American O.P.E.C. member, the Venezuelan oil minister, Rafael Ramirez, said Sunday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Venezuela Approves BP Asset Sale Talks
